mapper.sql: CONTRACT_ID, OFFEROR, CONTRACT_NO, SIGNING_DATE, INPUT_BY, CHECK_BY, INSPECTOR, TOTAL_AMOUNT, CREQUEST, CUSTOM_NAME, SHIP_TIME, IMPORT_NUM, DELIVERY_PERIOD, OLD_STATE, OUT_STATE, TRADE_TERMS, PRINT_STYLE, REMARK, STATE, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DEPT, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME

c.CONTRACT_ID, c.OFFEROR, c.CONTRACT_NO, c.SIGNING_DATE, c.INPUT_BY, c.CHECK_BY, c.INSPECTOR, c.TOTAL_AMOUNT, c.CREQUEST, c.CUSTOM_NAME, c.SHIP_TIME, c.IMPORT_NUM, c.DELIVERY_PERIOD, c.OLD_STATE, c.OUT_STATE, c.TRADE_TERMS, c.PRINT_STYLE, c.REMARK, c.STATE, c.CREATE_BY, c.CREATE_DEPT, c.CREATE_TIME, c.UPDATE_BY, c.UPDATE_TIME, p.CONTRACT_PRODUCT_ID, p.FACTORY_NAME, p.AMOUNT
mapper.select:
select
from CONTRACT_C c LEFT JOIN CONTRACT_PRODUCT_C p ON c.CONTRACT_ID=p.CONTRACT_ID group by c.CONTRACT_ID,p.FACTORY_NAME

select
distinct
from contract_c
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into contract_c (CONTRACT_ID, OFFEROR, CONTRACT_NO, SIGNING_DATE, INPUT_BY, CHECK_BY, INSPECTOR, TOTAL_AMOUNT, CREQUEST, CUSTOM_NAME, SHIP_TIME, IMPORT_NUM, DELIVERY_PERIOD, OLD_STATE, OUT_STATE, TRADE_TERMS, PRINT_STYLE, REMARK, STATE, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DEPT, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME ) values (#{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{offeror,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{inputBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inspector,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{crequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{importNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliveryPeriod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{oldState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{outState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tradeTerms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{printStyle,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

update contract_c
CONTRACT_ID = #{record.contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OFFEROR = #{record.offeror,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT_NO = #{record.contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
